document.full_text: a south florida man said he was trying to take a gun away from his toddler son when it fired, killing the boy's mother, according to a 911 call released by police on monday.
document.title: in 911 call, man says his toddler son fatally shot mother
lines_and_colors: a south florida man said he was trying to take a gun away from his toddler son when it fired, killing the boy's mother, according to a 911 call released by police on monday.
